Class TemplateFactoryBeanInputOuput

  • java.lang.Object

    TemplateBeanInput, TemplateBeanOutput

    public abstract class TemplateFactoryBeanInputOuput
extends java.lang.Object

        setAttributes: - set of the attributes that have to be put into generated class
